Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CAP18(106-137) (CAP18(106-142) fragment, synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is 86.49% similar toCAP18(106-142)K: 28%, L=R: 13%.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli HB101 (MIC 5.0 ug/ml), K-pneumoniae (MIC > 5 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 5.0 ug/ml), P. apacia (MIC 5 ug/ml), Gram+ S. pneumoniae (MIC ~5 ug/ml), S. pyogenes (MIC ~ 5.0 ug/ml), and  coagulase positive S. aureus (MIC >5.0 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Larrick JW, Hirata M, Shimomoura Y, Yoshida M, Zheng H, Zhong J, Wright SC. 1993
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial activity of rabbit CAP18-derived peptides.
